title: Review: SRAM Rival eTap AXS wireless drivetrain a perfect match for Mosaic Rt-2d
content:
Bicycle drivetrain launches typically follow the same format. First, the top tier group is launched with all new technology. Then, the next lower tier is released with most of the same performance, but a more attainable price tag. Finally, the entry level group is announced which brings modern performance to a level accessible to the [â€¦]

The post Review: SRAM Rival eTap AXS wireless drivetrain a perfect match for Mosaic Rt-2d appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
